decision_conditions: Th existing window in the north elevation of the conservatory hereby approved, shall be obscurely glazed.  A sample of the obscured glass, no smaller than 300mm square shall be submitted to the Local Planning Authority within 1 month of the date of this decision and the glazing so approved shall be installed within 2 months of the approval and be retained permanelty.  REASON:  To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties. | Full details of both hard and soft landscape works, including a phased programme of works, shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Authority within 3 months of the date of this decision and these works shall be carried out as approved.  Any trees or other plants, which die or are removed within the first five years following the implementation of the landscaping scheme, shall be replaced during the next planting season.  REASON: To ensure that the development is landscaped in the interests of the visual character and appearance of the area. | The garage permitted shall only be used for domestic purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the dwelling and not for any separate residential use or for any industrial, commercial or business use.  REASON: To protect the living conditions of occupiers of neighbouring properties.
description: Retention of rear conservatory and detached double garage in rear garden of house
